description:
Every other day we read reports that startups are valued at billions of dollars. Have you ever wondered how a businesses are worth billions of dollars?

Research shows that 87% of small business owners do not know the real value of their business. In fact another research shows that about 92% of businesses are undervalued during an investment round.

Be it your business, your personal finance or your savings, understanding finance is now an essential pre-requisite for business survival and informed decision making.

Interestingly, the single biggest skill in life that could make or break your financial success is not taught in school.

This course reveals how you can compute the value of any business in less than two hours!

There really is nothing more to do!
________________________________________________________________________

At the end of this course you will be able to:

  • Understand how businesses are valued.
  • Understand the three main approaches to business valuation.
  • Apply simple techniques to increase the value of your business.


The course will continue to grow and grow with new materials, new examples and new case studies being added every month!

______________________________________________________________________

About this course:

  • Step-by-Step approach to valuing businesses
  • Downloadable case studies and material
  • Full lifetime access to this course and course material
  • FREE access to me by e-mail for any questions or concerns
  • Unconditional 30 day money back guarantee by Udemy

So, why are you waiting? Join me in learning how businesses are valued, and find out the REAL value of your business!

Remember, for every minute that you are waiting, somebody else is getting ahead of you!
title: Business Valuation 101: How much is my business worth
